title: As AI Data Centers Disrupt US Cities, Wisconsin Woman Violently Arrested After Speaking Out
description: Public opposition to artificial intelligence data centers—and the push by corporations and officials to move forward with their construction anyway—were vividly illustrated in a viral video this week of a woman who was arrested after speaking out against a pr…
